backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles and chat storage with functions to manage profiles and post or fetch chat messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including styles, app structure, auth, profile, chat, hooks, and about page.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI layout with header, navigation, authentication-aware views, and routing between About, Chat, and Profile sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Component that blocks access to children until authentication is complete, showing loading or sign-in prompts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/about/AboutPage.ts: Public onboarding page explaining DM Networks, how to sign in, set up a profile, and start chatting with attribution to DMC Technologies.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatPage.tsx: Authenticated live chat page with message list, auto-scroll, message composer, refresh, and author display resolution.
frontend/src/features/chat/useAuthorDisp: Hook that retrieves a user’s profile to derive a display name or fallback to Anonymous User.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileFor: React form component for editing and validating a user profile with fields for display name, bio, and social links before saving.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfilePag: Profile page that loads the user's profile, displays a loading state, and saves updates using ProfileForm and backend hooks.
frontend/src/features/profile/validatePr: Validation helpers for profile fields including display name, bio length, and URL‑validated social links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Simple auth hook exposing authentication status and principal from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth, login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles and chat messages using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions for colors, radius, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata listing existing features, pending requests, and overall app summary for a DM Networks chat app.
